content: API call patterns and optimization opportunities - examine StockAPI module
Data processing and storage performance - examine StockData module with SwiftData
UI rendering and SwiftUI performance - examine main Stocks app views
Memory usage patterns and potential leaks - check retention cycles and memory management
Async/await usage and concurrency patterns - examine concurrent operations
Database query optimization (SwiftData) - examine query patterns and indexing
Network request batching and caching - examine API optimization strategies
View update cycles and unnecessary re-renders - examine SwiftUI state management
